pullRequest.title: Add dual screen support in common
pullRequest.bodyText:
Common's AuthorizationActivity (used by MSAL and Broker) is now able to detect dual screen and rearrange its UI accordingly.
DualScreenUtil will also be reused in ADAL, so I figured I should get this in first.
Let me know if you have any question. I can also send screenshots via Teams.
NOTE: we're still using public preview version for com.microsoft.device.display.displaymask.jar.
